author: stsp
msg: This is a quick fix for 1.6.x.
It's not clear yet what the optimal approach for trunk would be.
(get_mergeinfo_walk_cb): Don't treat file externals the same as switched
paths. Externals should not receive mergeinfo. It may not even be possible
to commit the mergeinfo changes (in case of file externals, the external
might not come from the HEAD revision, so committing the mergeinfo fails).
